languages.text: "Когда рядом с инквизитором пропадают люди, это всегда выглядит подозрительно".
"People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."
languages.original_text: "Когда рядом с инквизитором пропадают люди, это всегда выглядит подозрительно".

traits.locale_text: "It always looks suspicious when people are going missing around an inquisitor."
"It always looks suspicious when people are going missing around an inquisitor."
"It always looks suspicious when people are going missing around an inquisitor."
"It always looks suspicious when people are going missing around an inquisitor."
"People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."
"People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

languages.text: “如果审判官身边的人总是莫名其妙地消失，这肯定会引起怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

traits.locale_text: “审判长身边的人总是在失踪，这看起来真是相当可疑。”

languages.text: 「異端審問官の周辺で人々が消えると、その人物は常に疑念の対象となる」
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問官の周辺で人々が消えると、その人物は常に疑念の対象となる」

languages.text: «Siempre se levantan sospechas cuando la gente desaparece con un Inquisidor cerca».
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre parece sospechoso cuando la gente desaparece cerca de un Inquisidor».

languages.text: "Wenn im Umfeld eines Inquisitors plötzlich neue Gesichter auftauchen, ist das immer verdächtig."
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

traits.locale_text: "Es wirkt immer verdächtig, wenn aus der Umgebung eines Inquisitors Leute verschwinden."

languages.text: « Il est normal d'avoir des soupçons quand des gens disparaissent alors qu'un inquisiteur est dans les parages. »
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a rien de plus suspect que des gens qui disparaissent lorsqu'un inquisiteur est dans les parages... »

languages.text: "Bir Engizisyoncu'nun çevresinde insanların kaybolması daima şüphe uyandırır."
languages.original_text: "People disappearing in the vicinity of an Inquisitor is always cause for suspicion."
